title: Understanding Active Consent
description: Learn what active consent means and why it's crucial for healthy relationships.
content: Consent is a clear, voluntary, and enthusiast agreement to engage in sexual activity. It must be freely given, reversible, informed, enthusiastic, and specific (FRIES).

title: How to Ask for Consent
description: Practical tips and examples for clear communication with your partner.
content: Asking for consent doesn't have to be awkward. Simple questions like 'Is this okay?' or 'Do you like this?' can ensure both partners are comfortable and enjoying themselves.

title: Consent and Boundaries
description: Setting and respecting personal boundaries in sexual encounters.
content: Everyone has boundaries. Respecting them is key to mutual trust. You have the right to change your mind at any time, and so does your partner.
